abstract: Civil liberties and privacy advocates are becoming increasingly alarmed about business of selling data to law enforcement; say authorities may use information to discern who is most likely to offend, leading to discrimination and reinforcement of stereotypes.

headline.print_headline: The Risks to Civil Liberties When Big Data Is Put to Work Fighting Crime
headline.main: The Risk to Civil Liberties of Fighting Crime With Big Data

snippet: Technology that allows the police to analyze and share data helps prevent crime. But those sophisticated tools may put civil liberties in danger, too....
lead_paragraph: Technology that allows the police to analyze and share data helps prevent crime. But those sophisticated tools may put civil liberties in danger, too.
